item.title: Pausing Monthly Read Posts
item.description: I tried to share the best of what I read each month through my previous posts. While it helped me to push myself write a post each month, it was coming in the way of meditating on what I read. I will try to write (reming me if I donâ€™t) a post on what meditation on what you’ve read means, but it definitely does not mean completing your reading backlog for the sake of it.
